TopTrumpsApp

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • TopTrumpsApp.Deck
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    An instantiable class that defines a Deck. This class contains methods for shuffling and dealing a Deck of cards.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck(java.lang.String name,
            java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Deck 2-argument constructor. Calls the 2 mutators and setDeckNumber() method to initialise the attributes of a Deck object with some user-supplied values. The Deck ID is set internally using the value of a count variable to ensure unique Deck ID values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Deck
        cards - an ArrayList of Cards stored inside the Deck object

    • Method Detail

      • getDeckNumber

        public int getDeckNumber()
        Method to get the ID number of a Deck object.
        Returns:
        an Integer value specifying the ID of a Deck object

      • setDeckNumber

        public void setDeckNumber()
        Method to set the ID of a Deck object via incrementation of the static deckID count variable of the class. Ensures every Deck object will have a unique ID value.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Method to get the name of a Deck object
        Returns:
        a String a value specifying the name of the Deck object

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)
        Method to set the name of a Deck object
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Deck object

      • getCards

        public java.util.ArrayList<Card> getCards()
        Method to get the cards of a Deck object
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Cards within the Deck object

      • setCards

        public void setCards(java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards)
        Method to set the cards of a Deck object
        Parameters:
        cards - the cards inside a Deck object

      • shuffle

        public Deck shuffle(Deck deck)
        Method to shuffle a Deck object
        Parameters:
        deck - the name of the Deck object to be shuffled
        Returns:
        a Deck object which has been shuffled (cards rearranged into random positions in the ArrayList)

      • deal

        public java.util.ArrayList<Player> deal(Deck shuffledDeck,
                                        java.util.ArrayList<Player> players)
        Method to deal the cards of a Deck object to players in a Game object
        Parameters:
        shuffledDeck - Deck object which has been shuffled
        players - ArrayList of Player objects inside a Game object
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Player objects with cards added to their "hands" so they maybe partake in a game of Top Trumps.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Method to get the state of a Deck object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String value specifying the state of a Deck object
